de.lambeck.pned.elements

Interface INode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IElement
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataNode, IDataTransition, IGuiNode, IGuiPlace, IGuiTransition, IPlace, ITransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataNode, DataPlace, DataTransition, GuiNode, GuiPlace, GuiTransition

    public interface INode
extends IElement
    Interface for all nodes (places or transitions) in the Petri net.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the name of this node.

      Returns the position (center) of this node.

        getId

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this node.
        Returns:
        The name

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String newName)
        Sets the name of this node.
        Parameters:
        newName - The new name

      • getPosition

        java.awt.Point getPosition()
        Returns the position (center) of this node.

        Note that for the GUI "center" refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition). It does not include the label.
        Returns:
        The position

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(java.awt.Point newPosition)
        Sets the position (center) of this node.

        Note that for the GUI "center" refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition). It does not include the label.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The new position
